[
  [
    "id",
    "Id for filter chip button. If not provided, a unique id will be automatically generated and used.\nstring",
    "-"
  ],
  [
    "className",
    "Class to be applied to the outer <div> that contains filter chip button.\nstring",
    "-"
  ],
  [
    "label*",
    "Text for the filter chip.\nstring",
    "-"
  ],
  [
    "ariaClearLabel",
    "Labels filter action, i.e., \"Remove.\" For screenreader support.\nstring",
    "-"
  ],
  [
    "onDelete*",
    "Function to call when filter chip is dismissed.\n() => any",
    "-"
  ],
  [
    "useAlternateIcon",
    "Use alternate thinner close icon in place of standard.\nboolean",
    "-"
  ],
  [
    "size",
    "Sets the size of the chip to larger version.\n\"big\"",
    "-"
  ]
]
